p: To test clinical applicability, a decision tree was developed to classify patients into the seven clusters ( Figure 3). The decision tree was based on expert physicians' interpretation of the organs that were found together in the machine-learning workflow. The decision tree was constructed through observation of viSNE scatter plots and MEM labels from the clusters of patients identified by the machine learning ( Figures 1 and 2A). Patients' outcomes were not considered in developing the decision tree. This decision tree asks a series of seven questions and can phenotype patients in as few as one question for patients in Cluster 7.
